entries.meaning: A process for producing a design upon a surface in relief so that it can be printed from. Prepared chalk or zinc oxide is pressed upon a smooth plate by a hydraulic press, and the design is drawn upon this in a peculiar ink which hardens the surface wherever it is applied. The surface is then carefully rubbed or brushed, leaving the lines in relief.

verbs.description: graphotype (third-person singular simple present graphotypes, present participle graphotyping, simple past and past participle graphotyped)

entries.meaning: To produce a design by this process.
